short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Braze in-app and landing page campaigns with the Hippo Add-On Pack for Braze!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created by Hippocampus, this all-in-one Chrome extension empowers marketers to design interactive, high-impact campaigns—no coding skills required. Perfect for both non-technical users and experienced pros, the Hippo Add-On Pack enhances your Braze editor with dynamic elements and easy-to-use customization options.

With the Hippo Add-On Pack for Braze, you’ll gain access to:
• New! Email templates can be exported and imported between campaigns/canvases, workspaces, and even accounts.

• New! Pre-Designed Templates for In-App Messages: Choose from a curated collection of beautifully designed templates to quickly set up in-app messages that capture attention and engage users. These templates offer a wide variety of layouts, styles, and interactive elements tailored to different campaign goals, making it easy to deliver impactful messages without starting from scratch.

• Seamless Video Embedding: Effortlessly add videos from YouTube, Vimeo, or MP4 to your in-app messages and landing pages, complete with autoplay and mute controls to maximize engagement.

• Countdown Timers for Events: Add customizable countdowns for sales, product launches, or limited-time events, with personalized messaging after the timer ends.

• Scratch-to-Reveal Coupons: Offer an exciting scratch-to-reveal feature for coupon codes, boosting user interaction and anticipation.

• Animated Number Counters: Draw attention to important metrics or promotions with animated counters that increase user focus and engagement.

• Auto-Close Timers: Use countdowns that automatically close the message upon reaching zero, heightening urgency and maintaining user focus.

• Copy-to-Clipboard Coupon Codes: Display promotional codes with a simple click-to-copy feature, improving user convenience and offer redemption.

The Hippo Add-On Pack for Braze is your ultimate tool for creating powerful, interactive content within Braze—without needing HTML, CSS, or JavaScript expertise. Download now to unlock a new level of creativity and user engagement in your campaigns!
